docs.title: WARScribe Parser
docs.text:
High-level parsing for WARScribe notation.

Parse transcripts, extract actions, and analyze match data.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
from warscribe_parser import parse_transcript

transcript = parse_transcript("match.transcript")
for action in transcript.actions:
    print(action)

MIT License

docs.title: Development Setup
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/WARScribe-Parser.git
cd WARScribe-Parser
uv venv
uv pip install -e ".[dev]"

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/WARScribe-Parser.git
cd WARScribe-Parser
uv venv && uv pip install -e ".[dev]"

MIT License

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
uv pip install git+https://github.com/vindicta-platform/WARScribe-Parser.git

from warscribe_parser import parse_transcript

transcript = parse_transcript("match.transcript")
